page.title: 04A TOUR (page 3)
page.content: herds of{beef}cattle,some sheep,pigs and poultry. We notice the crops of{ {barley},fields for{silage},and for hay,land being prepared for{potatoes} for{market-gardening},and for{ {soft-fruit}growing. There are few industries here-a large{brick-works},a{kitchen-fitments} factory,a{plant-machinery sales and {repair}depot,a{machinery hire}centre and{garages}offering both sales and repairs. Two large stone-quarries gave employment in the past,but these are now "worked-out" and one is at present used as a dump. Our survey area is very pleasant,intensively-worked,well-tende d and neat ,and gives the impression that its people are proud of and happy in their district.
